abstract: The acquisition will give the aircraft maker more control over the delayed 787 Dreamliner.
snippet: The acquisition will give the aircraft maker more control over the delayed 787 Dreamliner.
lead_paragraph: The Boeing Company said Tuesday it acquired the remaining half of a venture that joins sections of the fuselage of the 787 Dreamliner from Finmeccanica of Italy, giving it greater control over the jet’s assembly.

headline.main: Boeing Buys Remainder of 787 Assembly Plant
headline.print_headline: Boeing Buys Remainder Of 787 Assembly Plant
